Posts.Title: Mass found during follow-up ultrasound to mammogram

Posts.Content: Praying that what they are seeing is a benign mass...Please keep us posted.
Posts.Title: Mass found during follow-up ultrasound to mammogram

Posts.Content: Brenda!!!!! That's awesome news!!! I'm so happy for you!!! Hugs; JackieJo
Posts.Title: Mass found during follow-up ultrasound to mammogram

Posts.Content: I know this is all so scary for you....the word cancer sends fear everyone....especially moms and dads with small children... Waiting for test results is one of the hardest and most stressful things to have to do but remember that cancer is not a death sentence. Most cancers are highly curable. Have they staged your cancer yet? Please know that I am holding you close to my heart and in my prayers.  Love, hugs and continuing prayers JackieJo
Posts.Title: What next....
